title: Evil Little Things
description: Something is wrong with Crista's children. Her partner, Matt House, tells her it's nothing to worry about. He says they're probably acting up because they didn't want to move into this new house. But Crista knows her children. She has seen them play up before at various times and this isn't like them. What they're saying, what they're doing... It's not like her children at all...From Matt Shaw (Sick B*stards, Porn, Whore) comes a tale of demonic possession and horror. What would you do if you suspected there were entities living within the bodies of your children?
author: Matt Shaw
